In a 2D heat conduction process with checkerboard pattern with alternating 100 °C and 0 °C and Neumann boundary conditions (zero flux at boundaries), what is the maximum gradient of temperature (°C) per cm after 117 seconds? (D=0.48, Lx=52 cm, Ly=10 cm)

In a 2D heat conduction process with constant initial temperature of 5 °C and Neumann boundary conditions (zero flux at boundaries), what is the maximum temperature (°C) after 180 seconds? (D=0.54, Lx=76 cm, Ly=5 cm)
